metadata.name: Firewall Rule Update Via Netsh.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects execution of netsh with the "advfirewall" and the "set" option in order to set new values for properties of a existing rule

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\netsh.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('netsh.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' firewall ')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' set ')))

output.summary: Detects execution of netsh with the "advfirewall" and the "set" option in order to set new values for properties of a existing rule

metadata.objective: False positives: 1. Legitimate administration activity 2. Software installations and removal Reference: https://ss64.com/nt/netsh.html
